entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Quinte West
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 12:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: E 18 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning near noon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
